data.message: All this technology is great . . . BUT why can't I figure out how to get someone who is "creating" a second Facebook account in my name OFF of facebook???   Maybe I'm just too old to figure it out???    Can anybody tell me how? . . .

replies.message: Hi Lorraine. We do not allow fake profiles created to imitate real people in our community. If someone created an account pretending to be you, please let us know by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1GMbeRF. Hope this helps! -Kristin
Thanks for the info Kristin.  I'm passing on this simple way to get rid of the "fake" profile.
